datasource.sql: select * from proj_metadata.metadata where theme = [string: theme];

update proj_metadata.metadata set beskrivelse=[string:beskrivelse], dataejer=[string:dataejer], dataejer_short=[string:dataejer_short], dataejer_email=[string:dataejer_email], revision_dato=now(), status=[string:status], opdaterings_frekvens=[string:opdaterings_frekvens], afdeling=[string:afdeling], center=[string:center], revision_user_short=[string:user_short], revision_user_long=[string:user_long] where id=[number:id];

insert into proj_metadata.metadata (beskrivelse, metadata_opret_dato, dataejer, dataejer_short, dataejer_email, revision_dato, theme, status, opdaterings_frekvens, afdeling, center, revision_user_short, revision_user_long) values ([string:beskrivelse], now(), [string:dataejer], [string:dataejer_short], [string:dataejer_email], now(), [string:theme], [string:status], [string:opdaterings_frekvens], [string:afdeling], [string:center], [string:revision_user_short], [string:revision_user_long])
